data: Sheldon L. Glashow Sheldon L. Glashow Higgins Professor of Physics, Emeritus  1979 Nobel Prize in Physics "For ... contributions to the theory of the unified weak and electromagnetic interaction between elementary particles, including, inter alia, the prediction of the weak neutral current." Physics Research Building, Room 567 3 Cummington Mall Boston, MA 02215 slg@bu.edu p: (617) 353-9099
